info.title: Hospital and Scheduling API
info.description: API for hospital, user, and scheduling operations

get.summary: Get schedules for a hospital with a specific status
Get schedules for a hospital with a specific name
Get schedules for a user in a hospital
Get book schedules for a hospital
Get mobile book schedules for a hospital
Get schedules statistics for a hospital
Get campaigns for a specific hospital

id.description: The ID of the campaign to be updated

campaignName.description: The updated name of the campaign

startDate.description: The updated start date of the campaign

endDate.description: The updated end date of the campaign

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the campaign to delete

get.summary: Get donation banks for a specific hospital

404.description: Hospital not found or no donation banks available

example.message: Hospital not found or no donation banks available

get.summary: Get donation banks for a specific hospital by years

200.description: Donation banks retrieval by years successful

404.description: Hospital not found or no donation banks available for the specified years

example.message: Hospital not found or no donation banks available for the specified years

put.description: Endpoint to redefine a user's password.

get.description: Endpoint to get a list of hospitals.

post.description: Endpoint to reset user or hospital password.
